Name: EE16 (16x Telescopic)
Description:
Manufacturer: Behring
Type: Telescopic  
Attachment Point: Optic
Magnification: 16x
Size: S3

Get a clear view of your target from afar with the EE16. Behring craftsmanship produced a 16x scope that's lightweight, durable, and deadly accurate. A rigorous 22-step testing process ensures the EE16 can deliver precision targeting even after encountering extreme weather or surviving battlefield wear and tear.
